room_title: Escape room "First Mission" by Golden Puzzle Room in Denver
room_description: Greeting Puzzle Sleuths. The Alphabet Gang has challenged you to a puzzling duel! They have left a series of mysterious clues for you in the Puzzle Sleuth clubhouse.  Your first mission, should you choose to accept it, is to decipher the clues, reveal a secret message and obtain a hidden object. The reputation of the Golden Puzzle Sleuths is at stake. We need you to prove that there is no puzzle we can’t solve, no clue we can’t find and no treasure we can’t unlock.  Good luck.
